product_name: Gear Aid Bug Mesh Patch Kit
long_description: The Gear Aid Bug Mesh Patch Kit features two 3-in. Tenacious Tape clear rings and 2 no-see-um mesh patches to cover up any small hole or tear in your bug netting while at home or in the field. Easy-to-use design: just position the mesh, then peel and stick the Tenacious Tape ring.
short_description: The Gear Aid Bug Mesh Patch Kit features two 3-in. Tenacious Tape clear rings and 2 no-see-um mesh patches to cover up any small hole or tear in your bug netting while at home or in the field.
